text: Bremanger is a municipality in Vestland county, Norway. In 2022, 3,521 people lived there. Culture: Rock carvings are in the landscape at Vingen-feltet; Some of the carvings are 6,000 years old.https://www.nrk.no/vestland/kommune- gjer-retrett-om-omstridd-steinutskiping_-1.17042071. Retrieved 2024-09-14 ==Economy== The dominanthttps://snl.no/Bremanger. SNL.no. Retrieved 2025-04-14 company, is a foundry, Elkem Bremanger. In March 2025, the municipal council will make its (last or) final decision about about building a factory in the so-called adventure tale forest; The planned ammonium factory, already has been promised two billion Euros from the EU.https://www.nrk.no/vestland/formannskapet-i-bremanger-seier-ja-til- omstridt-prosjekt-om-ammoniakkfabrikk-pa-holmaneset-1.17309215. title: Bremanger
